column5: Have traveled thru Canada on a Sunday each of the last 4 years due to the timing of our camp reservations. Have not passed by any obviously open beer shops. Would like to help the Canadian economy by purchasing some real beer (and not bring US stuff across the border). Anyone know if there is a place to pick up some adult beverages in any of the above listed spots?

Gopher Broke,There are beer depots in both Fort Francis and Dryden. Don't know if the one in Fort Francis is open on Sundays, however, the one in Dryden is open from 12:00 p.m. to 5:00 p.m.. Hope this helps.S.v.m
There is also a store not too far from Dryden (25 miles?)in Vermillion Bay that is open on Sundays... same hours, 12pm to 5pm.
